bio: Software developer with almost 5 years of experience delivering web-based solutions. Specialized in front-end development using JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Angular, and Node to build efficient and user-friendly interfaces.

I have hands-on experience across the entire software development lifecycle, from planning to deployment and maintenance. I've collaborated with international teams, effectively communicating fluently in English, Spanish, and Portuguese to ensure project success.
I am a Brazilian citizen, open to relocation, have availability for travel, and can start immediately. I am also flexible to work remotely or on-site.
hobbies: I love adventure and exploring cool, unusual places. I've hitchhiked across two continents and found spots most people don't even know exist. Sometimes I work while traveling as a digital nomad, and every now and then, I like to push myself like going on a 10-day hike just for fun!

I'm really into learning languages. Right now, I'm studying Mandarin Chinese. In addition to speaking fluently English, Portuguese, Spanish, and Esperanto, I've also learned a bit of French, Russian, Arabic, Brazilian Sign Language (Libras), and even Toki Pona. Talking to people in their own language is awesome!

I don't just work with tech, I live for it. Front-end development isn't just my job, it's my passion. I love designing cool UIs, whether for work or personal projects. I even have fun customizing my VSCode setup and tweaking my old Linux system just because I can.

projects.title: React To-Do List with TypeScript
projects.description: Simple to-do list application designed to help users manage their tasks efficiently. It allows users to add new tasks, mark or deselect tasks as completed, and delete tasks from the list.

projects.title: Community Feed
projects.description: This project simulates a social media feed, featuring functionalities such as commenting, applauding, and deleting comments. It is a React application using Vite, designed to practice important React concepts, including componentization, props, state, immutability, and hooks.

projects.title: KeyForge
projects.description: KeyForge is a secure and flexible password generation and evaluation library for Node.js. It allows you to generate strong, cryptographically secure passwords with customizable options, and also provides a function to check the strength and security level of existing passwords.

projects.title: Angular To-Do List
projects.description: This project is a simple to-do list application built with Angular. It allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks, as well as mark them as completed. The application uses Angular Material for styling and animations, and it is designed to practice Angular concepts such as components, services, routing, and forms.

projects.title: Angular Calendar
projects.description: This is a basic calendar application built from scratch using only Angular Material and Angular CDK.

projects.title: Svelte Calculator
projects.description: This project simulates the iPhone calculator app, with a similar layout and functionality.

projects.title: Bézier Curves
projects.description: This project is a simple web application that allows users to draw Bézier curves using the mouse. A Bézier curve is a mathematical curve that's used to create smooth, precise curves in computer graphics, animation, and design.

projects.title: Survive Game
projects.description: Survive is an audio game where the player must make decisions to survive in a post-apocalyptic world. The game is played entirely with audio, and the player must listen to the narrator and choose the best option to survive.

projects.title: Take the Color Game
projects.description: Take the Color is a game where the player clicks on colored balls. When a row of balls of the same color is formed, that row disappears from the screen.

projects.title: Bouncing Balls Game
projects.description: Bouncing Balls is an interactive screen where the player clicks to create a ball that starts bouncing. The player can create multiple balls with unique movements, filling the screen with colorful, bouncing balls!

projects.title: Proffy
projects.description: Proffy is a web and mobile application designed to connect teachers and students, in celebration of August 6, National Day of Education Professionals in Brazil.

projects.title: Investments Dashboard
projects.description: The Investments Dashboard simplifies the life of investors who just want to track the largest stock market fluctuations, key indices, and their favorite assets. With a simple and straightforward interface, users can enjoy a more pleasant experience for their routine monitoring.

projects.title: React To-Do List
projects.description: This project is a to-do list application built with React. It features functionalities to add new tasks, view all tasks, filter tasks as pending or completed, delete a single task, select multiple tasks for deletion, and a button to delete all tasks at once.

projects.title: React Movie List
projects.description: It displays a variety of movies, allowing users to select a movie from the list to view its details, add movies to a favorites list, remove them, and view the complete list of favorite movies.
